description.mekanismgenerators.advanced_: An advanced generator that directly absorbs th' sun's rays wit' wee loss t' produce energy.
description.mekanismgenerators.gas_burni: A generator that there 'arnesses the varyin' molecularrr gases to produce lightnin'.
description.mekanismgenerators.laser_foc: A panel of Reactor Glass that is capable of absorbing optical energy and thereby heating up the Fusion Reactor.
description.mekanismgenerators.reactor.l: The reactor's core heat capacity has been met
The reactor has insufficient fuel to sustain a reaction
Will not emit a redstone signal
Reactor has reached the required heat level to ignite
description.mekanismgenerators.reactor_g: Reinforced glass that can be used in the Fusion Reactor multiblock.
description.mekanismgenerators.rotationa: A connector that be placed on th' highest Turbine Rotor o' an Industrial Turbine t' carry kinetic energy into its Electromagnetic Coils.
description.mekanismgenerators.solar_gen: A generator that uses th' power o' th' sun t' produce energy.
reactor.mekanismgenerators.logic.deplete: Arr, we need more fuel matey!
tooltip.mekanismgenerators.hohlraum.insu: Arr, we need more fuel matey!
